panels.description: RabbitMQ message latency & throughput across all PerfTest instances
panels.title: DETAILS

targets.expr: {namespace="$namespace",container="rabbitmq",app="$rabbitmq_cluster"} != "accepting AMQP connection" != "closing AMQP connection" != "Closing all channels from connection" != "rabbit_connection_sup" != "connection_closed_with_no_data_received"
